item.title: physics737
item.description: Intensive Week: Advanced Topics in Photonics and Quantum Optics (E) - physics737 Course Intensive Week: Advanced Topics in Photonics and Quantum Optics (E) Course No. physics737 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Combined lecture, seminar, lab course English 3 4 WT/ST Requirements: Preparation: Fundamentals of optics, fundamentals of quantum mechanics Form of Testing and Examination: Seminar or oral examination Length of Course: 1 - 2 weeks Aims of the Course: The intensive course will convey the basics of a recent topic in photonics or quantum optics in theory and experiments.
